MetaData.MetaDataItem:
The Z-Wave.Me Key Fob is a mobile Z-Wave device that can both control other Z-Wave devices and activate predefined scenes in an IP gateway.
The Key Fob can be used in five different modes: 1) Direct Control of associated Devices with single Buttons 2) Direct Control of associated Devices with two Buttons 3) Scene Activation in IP Gateway 4) Direct Activation of preconfigured Scenes 5) Direct Control of Devices in proximityâ€¨

ChangeLog.Entry: Initial Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/688/xml

Value.label: Button 1 and 3 pair mode
Value.Help: In separate mode button 1 works with group 1, button 3 with groups 3. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down. In pair button 1/3 are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group 1, double click with group 3.

Value.label: Modes for Button 2 and 4
Value.Help: In separate mode button 2 works with group 2, button 4 with groups 4. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down. In pair button 2/4 are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group 2, double click with group 4.

Value.label: Action on group 1
Value.Help: In Switch On/Off only mode On command is sent on Dim Up, Off on Dim Down. In Scenes mode the scene ID sent is (10 * group + ActionID), where ActionID is: 1 = On, 2 = Off, 3 = Dim Up Start, 4 = Dim Down Start, 5 = Dim Up Stop, 6 = Dim Down Stop

Item.label: Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel) (default)

Value.label: Action on group 2
Value.Help: In Switch On/Off only mode On command is sent on Dim Up, Off on Dim Down. In Scenes mode the scene ID sent is (10 * group + ActionID), where ActionID is: 1 = On, 2 = Off, 3 = Dim Up Start, 4 = Dim Down Start, 5 = Dim Up Stop, 6 = Dim Down Stop

Item.label: Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel) (default)

Value.label: Action on group 3
Value.Help: In Switch On/Off only mode On command is sent on Dim Up, Off on Dim Down. In Scenes mode the scene ID sent is (10 * group + ActionID), where ActionID is: 1 = On, 2 = Off, 3 = Dim Up Start, 4 = Dim Down Start, 5 = Dim Up Stop, 6 = Dim Down Stop

Item.label: Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel) (default)

Value.label: Action on group 4
Value.Help: In Switch On/Off only mode On command is sent on Dim Up, Off on Dim Down. In Scenes mode the scene ID sent is (10 * group + ActionID), where ActionID is: 1 = On, 2 = Off, 3 = Dim Up Start, 4 = Dim Down Start, 5 = Dim Up Stop, 6 = Dim Down Stop

Item.label: Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel) (default)

Value.label: Typical click timeout
Value.Help: Typical time used to differentiate click, hold and double clicks 1-100 in 10 ms units (default is 50, that is equivalent to 500 ms)

Value.label: Send the following Switch All commands
Value.Help: Send the following Switch All ON/OFF commands

Value.label: Invert buttons
Value.Help: Invert meaning of On/Dim up and Off/Dim down in pairs of buttons. This applies only to pairs in grouped mode. Buttons 1 and 2 will become Off/Dim down, buttons 3 and 4 On/Dim up.

Value.label: LED confirmation mode
Value.Help: To save batteries LED confirmation can be disabled.

Value.label: Blocks wake up even when wake up interval is set
Value.Help: If the KFOB wakes up and there is no controller nearby, several unsuccessful communication attempts will drain battery

Item.label: Wakeup is possible if configured accordingly.

Value.label: Send unsolicited Battery Report on Wake Up

Item.label: To same node as wakeup notification

Group.label: Controlled by button 1 or single clicks of buttons 1 and 3
Controlled by button 2 or single clicks of buttons 2 and 4
Controlled by button 3 or double clicks of buttons 1 and 3
Controlled by button 4 or double clicks of buttons 2 and 4
